navbarMenu.ddTitle: What language do you want to study?

Diferenciadores.p: We create a unique methodology that allows you to learn a new language in a fun and different way.

Customers.p: More than two decades driving business growth

SeccionBlog.p: Learn about essential topics to improve your English.

HeroAboutUs.p: We help you achieve your dreams.
HeroAboutUs.p2: Achieve better opportunities for personal and professional growth.

NuestraHistoriaPage.p: Fyr Lois es un proyecto de vida que nace en La Florida, tras consolidar una metodología desarrollada luego de 25 años de experiencia en los que habíamos ofrecido nuestros cursos en países como Venezuela, México, Colombia y Costa Rica.
NuestraHistoriaPage.p2: Over the years we have developed a language teaching method with a unique methodology in the market, focused on communicational and experiential teaching, through practical and fun classes.
NuestraHistoriaPage.p3: Our teaching formula is close, enjoyable and effective. Through any of our 2 modalities (In-person - Online) students will enjoy 100% live classes and small groups that guarantee them support throughout their learning process.

NuestrosTeachers.p: Learning English is easy if you have the right help.

FormContactUs.p: If you want to know more information about our courses, complete your information and we will answer all your questions.

MasInfoContactUs.p: If you want to contact us directly, you can do so through these means.

sedes.h1: We have a course for you wherever you are
sedes.p: Select your city to show you all the available options

SeccionMiss.h3: “Me siento muy orgulloso de pertenecer a Fyr Lois. Para mí representa la mejor academia de idiomas que he encontrado.
SeccionMiss.p: Había intentando estudiar inglés muchas veces, pero nunca había podido encontrar un lugar donde me sintiera tan a gusto, donde sintiera que mi avance es importante y donde realmente viera resultados.”
SeccionMiss.h3b: “Sin duda, Fyr Lois es la academia de inglés que estaba buscando.
SeccionMiss.pb: Las clases que tuve con el profesor Jesús Prato fueron muy enriquecedoras. Su paciencia y conocimientos me permitieron superar mis miedos y alcanzar un nivel de inglés que nunca pensé que lograría. Recomiendo ampliamente Fyr Lois a quienes deseen mejorar su dominio del idioma.”
SeccionMiss.p2b: George Harris- Comediante, periodista y presentador,

item1.p: Generate more and better opportunities for personal and professional growth for those who are determined to build their life project.

item2.p: Only through the generation of results do we generate value for ourselves and our community.

item3.p: We believe in fun and entertainment as the way to integrate learning.

CursosOnlineHome.p: Each student is a life project to fulfill. That is why we offer you a course adapted to your interests and needs.

DiferenciadoresOnline.h2: How will you learn English with us?

YaEsHora.h1: It's time to learn a new language
YaEsHora.p: Thanks to our 25 years of experience, we have developed a practical and fun methodology with which you will learn to speak the language fluently. Through 100% live classes, adapted to your level of knowledge, with certified teachers and a unique teaching method.
YaEsHora.p2: Master that language you've always wanted, sign up now.

ViveUnaExperiencia.h2: Start your path to language mastery
ViveUnaExperiencia.p: Each student is different, which is why we offer a course adapted to their interests and needs.

LlevaTuProyecto.p: Communicate in English fluently, without insecurities and achieve the opportunities you dream of

courses.p: Learn at ease with a methodology adapted to your level, age, interests and agenda.

DifCursosOnline.h2: Do you know why learn with us?
DifCursosOnline.p: We design a memorable learning experience, in which you will feel motivated, comfortable and happy with your results.

SiguesTeniendoDudas.h3: Do you still have doubts about
SiguesTeniendoDudas.p: We are here to help you solve any questions you may have and help you complete your registration process.
